title: Digital Electronics and Integrated Circuits Laboratory
description: Computer simulation and experimental investigation of the characteristics, applications and interfacing of different logic families. 1 laboratory.
prerequisites: EE/CPE 129 & EE/CPE 169 or EE/CPE 133, EE 306 & EE 346
corequisites: EE 307, EE/CPE 229 or EE/CPE 233 (may be taken previously)
